original_text: This letter is from me, Paul. I am God's servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ. God has sent me to help the people that he has chosen. I teach them to understand his true message and to trust him. As a result they will live in a way that pleases God.
korean_text: 하나님의 종이요 예수 그리스도의 사도인 나 바울이 사도 된 것은 하나님이 택하신 자들의 믿음과 경건함에 속한 진리의 지식과

sentences.original_text: This letter is from me, Paul.
and an apostle of Jesus Christ.
to help the people that he has chosen.
I teach them to understand his true message
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 그의 참된 메시지를 이해하도록 가르칩니다.

sentences.original_text: As a result they will live
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 그들은 살게 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: in a way that pleases God.
